channel.title: Gp Addin Window Modal on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Gp Addin Window Modal on 0x000216

item.title: Issues with the Modal GP AddIn Window
item.description:
I built a GP AddIn to add a custom options window to the Vendor Maintenance GP window. This window let users attach a list of attributes to a vendor ID. The process was smooth and effective initially, until I tried making the window modal. While the .ShowDialog method successfully displayed the window, it became unresponsive to mouse interactions (a short video demonstrating this is available here: http://www.precipioservices.com/gp10/ - requires IE and Flash)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/issues-with-the-modal-gp-addin-window/
